import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Header from './Header.js' import Section from './Section.js' import MenuItem from './MenuItem.js' import Footer from './Footer.js' class App extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { venue: 'Dexter', sections: [ { name: 'Snacks', items: [] }, { name: 'Small', items: [] }, { name: 'Large', items: [] }, { name: 'Buns', items: [] }, { name: 'Greens / Salad', items: [] }, { name: 'Dessert', items: [] }, { name: 'Extras', items: [] } ] } } render() { let venue = this.state.venue let sections = this.state.sections return (
); } } export default App;
